result.assessor: Fernado, M., Kotagama, O. & de Alwis Goonatilake, S.
result.errata_reason: A corrected (errata) assessment has been created to correct the distribution map, the Geographic Range text, and the extent of occurrence (EOO) and area of occupancy (AOO) values for this species. These corrections do not affect the final Red List category and criteria assigned.
